title: The Microscope
creator_credit: Realist Films, John Taylor and Alex Strasser
brief_description: This film is designed for upper secondary and tertiary students of biology, medicine etc. Its purpose is to encourage the efficient and careful use of microscopes. The parts of the microscope, the correct way to set it up and the routine of procedure for high-power work are explained.
